channel.title: Come play our small RSPS Darkscape!
channel.description:
WEBSITE FOR MORE INFO AND TO DOWNLOAD CLIENT AND PLAY!
http://darkscapeps.weebly.com/
DARKSCAPE IS A TOTALLY 100% FREE TO PLAY, OPEN SOURCE AND GLITCHY ALTHOUGH ENJOYABLE RS2007 CLONE, ORIGINALLY MADE BY WILDDREAMS, I HAVE STARTED TO ALTER THE CLIENTS CODE AND CREATE DARK SCAPE, ITS A TRICKY PROJECT BUT I DO HAVE 1 HAMACHI SERVER OPEN FOR A FEW PLAYERS TO TRY.
this server is not that much of a serious project, my cousin and I have been playing this server together for a while now alone and we want a few more players to join in!
Please download the client and play darkscape with us today!
*Logmein Hamachi IS needed
SET CLIENTS IP AND PORT # TO THESE BELOW AND SEARCH FOR ``DSOSERV`` IN HAMACHI TO JOIN THE SERVER.
HAMACHI NETWORK NAME: DSOSERV
HAMACHI I.P ADDRESS: 25.164.37.137
PORT: 43594
PLEASE LET ME KNOW WHAT YOU THINK, FIRST PLAYERS TO JOIN WILL BE GIVEN A BLUE PHAT

item.title: Come play our small RSPS Darkscape!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“icedteadoe, post:17, topic:551185”]Well Hamachi can cause alot of problems and is just not reliable, I was using it to host my server for a while, but tried playing on it with my cousin a few days ago and i kept losing connection on my client.

I wanna portforward it as it seems to be the easiest way, but everytime i have tried it either screwed up my connection or did not work.

Hamachi has alot of problems, but atleast it actually worked for me lol. If someone could redirect me to a guide to portforwarding with alot of explaining or just explain in detail to me how to go about doing it without having to pay for a server I would appreciate it! :D[/quote]
What router do you have? The most I could give you is generalized instructions.

There are tools out there too… I used to use this one: http://simpleportforwarding.com back when I couldn’t portforward.
What was strange was on my router, I’d do all the steps that tool did, and I still couldn’t connect. But when the tool did it, it allowed me to. I dunno. But my new router doesn’t have that issue.

Also http://portforward.com/ has guides for like every router in existence.

Read full topic
item.source: Come play our small RSPS Darkscape!

item.title: Come play our small RSPS Darkscape!
item.dc:creator: @CSharp95 CSharp95
item.description:
@CSharp95 wrote:

[quote=“icedteadoe, post:17, topic:551185”][quote author=CSharp95 link=topic=670102.msg4481027#msg4481027 date=1429763013]

What’s wrong with Hamachi? It’s a decent solution for something meant to be small. I used it for old Terraria servers all the time.

I’m not gonna download, install, and setup hamachi to play 1 small server that will last who knows how long.

Yeah, it’s so difficult, .msi files are so hard to work.
I get it though, nobody wants to mess with it. I just don’t get why it’s always such as horrible idea when it’s actually really common for small gaming servers.
[/quote]

Well Hamachi can cause alot of problems and is just not reliable, I was using it to host my server for a while, but tried playing on it with my cousin a few days ago and i kept losing connection on my client.

I wanna portforward it as it seems to be the easiest way, but everytime i have tried it either screwed up my connection or did not work.

Hamachi has alot of problems, but atleast it actually worked for me lol. If someone could redirect me to a guide to portforwarding with alot of explaining or just explain in detail to me how to go about doing it without having to pay for a server I would appreciate it! :D[/quote]
I’ve had very few issues with it, actually. I’ve played Terraria multiplayer on it for 8-10 hours straight without many latency issues.

If you don’t want to use it then, it’s best just to get a small VPS, that way you yourself don’t have to host it and all you need to do is turn it on, get some form of auto restarter going, and then mostly forget about it.

Read full topic
item.source: Come play our small RSPS Darkscape!

item.title: Come play our small RSPS Darkscape!
item.dc:creator: @icedteadoe icedteadoe
item.description:
@icedteadoe wrote:

[quote=“CSharp95, post:16, topic:551185”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=670102.msg4480967#msg4480967 date=1429731590]

What’s wrong with Hamachi? It’s a decent solution for something meant to be small. I used it for old Terraria servers all the time.

I’m not gonna download, install, and setup hamachi to play 1 small server that will last who knows how long.
[/quote]
Yeah, it’s so difficult, .msi files are so hard to work.
I get it though, nobody wants to mess with it. I just don’t get why it’s always such as horrible idea when it’s actually really common for small gaming servers.[/quote]

Well Hamachi can cause alot of problems and is just not reliable, I was using it to host my server for a while, but tried playing on it with my cousin a few days ago and i kept losing connection on my client.

I wanna portforward it as it seems to be the easiest way, but everytime i have tried it either screwed up my connection or did not work.

Hamachi has alot of problems, but atleast it actually worked for me lol. If someone could redirect me to a guide to portforwarding with alot of explaining or just explain in detail to me how to go about doing it without having to pay for a server I would appreciate it!

Read full topic

item.source: Come play our small RSPS Darkscape!

item.title: Come play our small RSPS Darkscape!
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Essentially this system works best for OP just wanting to play with a few ‘friend’s’ to just mess around and have fun. I’ve done it before with friends of mine. Just gave everyone staff privileges and just pvp each other and pvm and what not out of bordem. However Hamachi is not a good idea here, just portforward it’ll make everyone’s lives easier. If you cannot open ports because your ISP or school or something is blocking them, well, you’re just outta luck. Have a friend host it or invest in a cheap vps for other uses than just this, they can be helpful in may ways, for many different kind of projects.

Read full topic

item.title: Come play our small RSPS Darkscape!
item.dc:creator: @icedteadoe icedteadoe
item.description:
@icedteadoe wrote:

[quote=“Welliton_inc, post:9, topic:551185”][quote author=icedteadoe link=topic=670102.msg4480943#msg4480943 date=1429715246]

I love these old types of servers. But you should not be using hamachi. I don’t really know what you want to achieve with this as you imply that you’re not taking this very seriously. Regardless, goodluck

I don’t really know why you had to state that, i explained pretty well my reasoning for doing this and running this server. but okay, thanks
[/quote]
I understand you want to host this server for fun, but I just don’t see what you are benefiting from this? It doesn’t look like you’ve made a single change to the client and possibly even server-sided.

I don’t really know, it’s just weird that’s all.[/quote]

fair enough but yeah , i did make minor changes nothing too crazy though, either way i will see about setting it up some other way than hamachi.

Read full topic

item.title: Come play our small RSPS Darkscape!
item.dc:creator: @icedteadoe icedteadoe
item.description:
@icedteadoe wrote:

[quote=“Paradox68, post:4, topic:551185”][quote author=icedteadoe link=topic=670102.msg4480899#msg4480899 date=1429659515]

Oh my god. Hamachi hosted. LMFAO IM DED.

Yeah maybe if it was supposed to be a big and serious server :palm:
[/quote]

Sorry dude, you haven’t changed the client title. Your crowns are atrocious, the grammar is terrible, You have dark dagger as a godsword (Cammy PK Style), and nobody is gonna want to do hamachi. Portforwarding isn’t that hard, and I might be willing to help you out with it if you wanted. We’re a friendly community, but we don’t appreciate when people post servers that are half-assed. No offence intended.[/quote]

All good, i can see what you mean, Im not looking for serious players to come play on this, just anyone who would want to do some skilling or pking with my cousin and i for fun.

Also i haven’t changed it cause i couldn’t actually figure out how too x) and the dark dagger as the godsword is pretty funny, You can blame the original maker for that, and it doesnt seem like it, but im very confused, i tried running it instead with no - ip but the instructions i followed werent very specific and i couldnt get it to connect to my other computer, a matter of fact when i changed he network props to try and make a static IP (apparently i need one to use as the server ip i guess) and when i did that, it fucked up my internet connection LOL So hamachi is a no no for me now, the only reason why i used it was cause it was my only option that actually worked for me

i used utorrent to port forward before with the hamachi server but i also got told i cant do it with that so idk what to do haha.

if you would be willing to help in anyway id appreciate it, and yeah i get that, but i wasnt exactly targeting this towards anyone to make it popular or nothing, id just like to get maybe less than 5 people playing with us, however if i can learn to get the server running some other way and i learn how to improve on the client id maybe than id try to get alot of players.

Read full topic

Portforwarding isn’t that hard, and I might be willing to help you out with it if you wanted. We’re a friendly community, but we don’t appreciate when people post servers that are half-assed. No offence intended.
